entry.source: {F812}Male demonoid\0{F87A,167}{F813,1,412103}Who the... I haven't seen you around.{F801}You don't look like a demonoid...{F801}{F802}Are you a neurisher on the run from{F801}a nearby town? But there's nothing{F801}on top of your head...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Male demonoid\0{F87A,167}{F813,1,412101}Ever since I became a demonoid, I've{F801}lost track of the news and the net...{F801}{F802}I'm sure no one knows what's going on{F801}outside Tokyo.{F801}{F802}Since we wrecked the place, there's no{F801}communication technology left. Even the{F801}terrain's different.{F801}{F802}But if the demons did kick the angels'{F801}asses, I bet America and China are in{F801}basically the same situation.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Male demonoid\0{F87A,145}{F813,1,415202}Neurishers are food for demonoids...{F801}Every neurisher is some demonoid's{F801}property.{F801}{F802}So who's your master? If you ain't got{F801}anyone, let me know, and I'll snap{F801}you up.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Male demonoid\0{F87A,145}{F813,1,415205}Neurishers reflect a demonoid's status.{F801}The more you own, the stronger a{F801}demonoid you are.{F801}{F802}So there's fierce competition between{F801}demonoids for ownership of neurishers.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Male demonoid\0{F87A,145}{F813,1,415205}Neurishers reflect a demonoid's status.{F801}The more you own, the stronger a{F801}demonoid you are.{F801}{F802}So there's fierce competition between{F801}demonoids for ownership of neurishers.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Male demonoid\0{F87A,145}{F813,1,415100}You guys are headed for Shinjuku, right?{F801}I'll tell you how to get there...{F801}{F802}First you leave Kasumigaseki, then head{F801}north.
